Name: Mirror Mysteries
About the game: A young family stops at a mysterious old home for a picnic and as the mother closes her eyes to enjoy the sun, she hears a horrific crash, the kids! As she enters the house, she is confronted by a mystical mirror that’s taken her kids and locks them away in a magical world. A quest is placed upon you to not just save your children but help a unique character in very mystical places. Can you solve the Mirror Mysteries! Features: • 7 Enchanted worlds to explore • Unique hidden object game play • Can you rescue your kids and fix the broken Mirrors
